scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && cross-env PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --log-level debug
scripts.dev:insights: concurrently --kill-others --names "API,INSIGHTS" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "cd packages/insights && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others --names "API,WEB" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:insights"
scripts.dev:full: concurrently --kill-others "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.kill:node: powershell "Get-Process node -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force" 2>nul || echo No Node processes to kill
scripts.kill:python: powershell "Get-Process python -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Stop-Process -Force" 2>nul || echo No Python processes to kill
scripts.kill:all: npm run kill:node && npm run kill:python
scripts.clean:cache: cd backend && powershell "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Name '__pycache__' | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" 2>nul && powershell "Get-ChildItem -Recurse -Name '*.pyc' | Remove-Item -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" 2>nul || echo Cache cleaned
scripts.check:ports: echo === Checking development ports === && netstat -ano | findstr :8000 && netstat -ano | findstr :5173 && netstat -ano | findstr :3000 || echo No servers found on development ports
scripts.check:processes: echo === Node processes === && tasklist | findstr node.exe && echo === Python processes === && tasklist | findstr python.exe || echo No development processes found
scripts.dev:clean: npm run kill:all && powershell "Start-Sleep 2" && npm run clean:cache && npm run dev:all
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run kill:all && npm run clean:cache && npm run dev:all
scripts.status: npm run check:ports && npm run check:processes
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/shared && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
